text: The Scorpio is a 1984 Dutch thriller movie directed by Ben Verbong (who also stars) and also starring Peter Tuinman, Monique van de Ven, Adrian Brine, Henk van Ulsen, Edwin de Vries, Marijke Veugelers, Senne Rouffaer, Huub Stapel, Teddy Schaank, Ab Abspoel. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 thriller movies Category:Dutch thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Ben Verbong
title: The Scorpio (movie)
